text: "Paint It Black" (stylized as "PAiNT it BLACK") is a song by the Japanese girl idol group BiSH, released as its third major-label single on 28 March 2018. The song was used as the second opening theme for the anime series Black Clover. (Starting from the 14th episode, broadcast on TV Tokyo and BS Japan on 8 January 2018.) Released as a single on the label Avex Trax on 28 March 2018, this song debuted at number one on the Oricon CD Single Chart. == References == == External links == * Black Clover opening 2 – "Paint It Black" on YouTube Category:2018 songs Category:2018 singles Category:Avex Trax singles Category:Anime songs Category:Oricon Weekly number-one singles
title: Paint It Black (BiSH song)
